data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 6, Kazushi Mitsuhira (Oita) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Throw-in for Oita close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 11, Throw-in Gamba.
Free kick Gamba.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Yuya Fukuda (Gamba) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Gamba throw-in in Oita's half.
Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
Oita to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Gamba.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Yoshiro Imamura awards Gamba a goal kick.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Oita.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Free kick for Oita in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Gamba at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Gamba pushes forward through Ademilson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Gamba at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Gamba.
In the minute 45, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Oita throw-in in Gamba's half.
Patric is replacing Kazuma Watanabe for Gamba at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Oita.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 49, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Gamba's Yuki Yamamoto misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 51, Oita have a goal kick.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 52, Patric (Gamba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 55, Oita drive upfield and Tatsuya Tanaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Yosuke Ideguchi (Gamba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 58, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Patric (Gamba) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Oita.
In Oita, Tomoki Iwata of Oita is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
In the minute 65, Oita have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Oita surge into the attack at Showa Denko Dome Oita but Yoshinori Suzukiâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Gamba at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Ademilson with Takashi Usami. This is the second substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's third substitution at Showa Denko Dome Oita with Shinya Yajima replacing Yuki Yamamoto.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 68, Oita have a goal kick.
Ryosuke Tone is on a sub for Yuji Hoshi for Oita.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
In the minute 72, Patric scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Takashi Usami to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Oita in the half of Gamba.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Tatsuya Tanaka (Oita) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Gamba defenders.
In the minute 78, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Oita throw-in in Gamba's half.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Shinya Yajima for Gamba drives towards goal at Showa Denko Dome Oita. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Oita, close to Gamba's area.
The home team replace Kazushi Mitsuhira with Naoki Nomura.
Tomohiro Katanosaka (Oita) is making a fifth substitution, with Toshio Shimakawa replacing Kento Haneda.
In the minute 82, Oita make their third substitution with Yuya Takazawa replacing Kohei Isa.
Kei Chinen is replacing Tatsuya Tanaka for the home team.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Oita.
Yushi Hasegawa for Oita gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Gamba to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Gamba at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
At Showa Denko Dome Oita the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Oita to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Kei Chinen's header is off-target for Oita.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
Shinya Yajima for Gamba is whistled offside.
In Oita Oita attack through Toshio Shimakawa. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Gamba make their fourth substitution with Riku Matsuda replacing Ryu Takao.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's fifth substitution at Showa Denko Dome Oita with Dai Tsukamoto replacing Shu Kurata.
